title: How long will it take for PBE to let me in?
body: I have been asking and asking to join the PBE to test the new lb but I have not been fortunate.  I am a LeBlanc mains so that would bump me up a bit, but how come I have not been chosen?

replies.body: I applied like.. 24524 years ago. so.. don't wait around staring at your email. LOL

Applying and continuing to play the game actively while waiting are really the best steps to take to get into the PBE. The criteria we use to select testers will often change depending on what we're testing at the moment. However, we typically look for active players who are a positive influence on the community.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) if you'd like a rundown on the system. Let me know if you have any additional questions.
